英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards of Green Building and Building Energy-Efficiency Label
中文法規名稱: 綠建築標章及建築能效標示規費收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Adopted on April 1, 2010 by the Order Tai-Nei-Jian-Yan-Tzu No. 0990057031
2.Amended and promulgated on March 31, 2018 by the Order Tai-Nei-Jian-Yan-Tzu No. 1070850290
3.Article 2 amended & published under Ministry of the Interior Order Tai-Nei-Jian-Yan-Tzu No. 1137638492 Jul.02, 2024

法規內容.條文內容: The Standards are enacted pursuant to Paragraph 1 of Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

Review fees and certificate fees shall be paid in accordance with the following regulations for the application of Green Building Label, Green Building Candidate Certificate, Building Energy-Efficiency Label and Building Energy-Efficiency Candidate Certificate:
1. Review fees:
(1) New application and extension of certification: NT$800 each.
(2) Replacement and additional issue: NT$300 each.
(3) English translated version: NT$800 each.
(4) Building name modification: NT$100 each.
2. Certificate fee: NT$200 each.
The certificate fee will be refunded if the application be rejected or re-examination is not submitted within the time limit.

The fees stipulated in the preceding article may not be returned after payment, with the exception of overpayment or erroneous payment, which may be handled in accordance with the relevant regulations in the Charges and Fees Act.
The Standards are enforced from the date of promulgation.
